-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT DISTINCT tolls_amount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://tademosynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/tademosynapse/data/demo_fares-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
